constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of single storey rear extension
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposal accords with criteria (a) and (b) of A.2 of Part 18, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (As amended). Therefore, prior approval should be given for the proposed development.The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / details: 100001 Site Location Plan Rev A01 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000016 Proposed Bridge Level Plan Rev P04 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000041 Visuals 02 Rev P01 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000011 Proposed Platform Level Plan Rev P04 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000017 Proposed Roof Level Plan Platform 3 and 4 Rev P04 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000021 Proposed Elevation and Section Rev P04 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000025 Proposed Elevations Platform 3 and 4 Rev P05 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000035 Proposed Sections (1 of 2) Platform 3 and 4 Rev P04 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000036 Proposed Sections (2 of 2) Platform 3 and 4 Rev P04 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000040 Visuals 01 Rev P01 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000004 Demolition Plans Rev P03 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000010 Material Pallet Rev P04 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000010 Site Plan Rev P03 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000012 Proposed Bridge Level Plan Rev P04 174026-FP-1600-SUR01-DOC-EAR-000015 Proposed Platform Level Plan 3 and 4 Rev P04 Additional Project Information ReportReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Change of use from communal laundry room into an additional bedroom to be incorporated into Flat 3, Ockley House, Kingsnympton Park.'
